channel.title: █Finding spell ID's!█
channel.description:
How do you find spell ID's? I have been messing around with my server trying to make teleporting work. But, i just simply can't find the id for [Code] if(magicID == 1164) [/code]
help is apreciated
It is not just as simple as right clicking, because when you do just right click, it comes up with wrong ID.

item.title: █Finding spell ID's!█
item.dc:creator: @o_b_b_y_k_o o b b y k o
item.description:
@o_b_b_y_k_o wrote:

hey atleast thanks for trying. Even though spells don’t show up. :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 01, 2008, 05:53:14 PM[/size][hr]teleport spells show up, but that ID doesn’t work.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 01, 2008, 05:56:25 PM[/size][hr]OMG, Okay this is an example:

[size=15pt]ghorrok teleport says 13095 next to it. But the real magic ID is 51039…[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: █Finding spell ID's!█
item.dc:creator: @killer75230 killer75230
item.description:
@killer75230 wrote:

this is simple, okay get on the silabsoft client, then hover over the tele you want in the top left corner the id for it will pop up thanks
